meanings.definition: Expressed with excessive detail or precision.
meanings.sent1: The overarticulated instructions were confusing for the students.
meanings.sent2: Her overarticulated speech made the presentation seem overly long.
meanings.sent3: The overarticulated recipe called for an absurd amount of salt.
meanings.sent4: His overarticulated drawings were so detailed, they looked almost real.
meanings.sent5: The overarticulated map included every tiny street and alley in the city.

meanings.definition: Pronounced or enunciated too clearly or distinctly.
meanings.sent1: The overarticulated pronunciation of the foreign word made it hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: She overarticulated each syllable, making her speech sound unnatural.
meanings.sent3: The overarticulated announcement over the intercom startled everyone in the office.
meanings.sent4: His overarticulated singing voice echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The overarticulated words rang out in the quiet room, emphasizing every sound.
